entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Addition vectorized functions #103845
    9.0.0
  • ILC: FileNotFoundException for base type from unresolved assembly #103843
  • Regex with negated non-ascii ranges emits empty `IndexOfAnyExcept` check #103842
  • Consider emitting unicode escape sequences for character ranges in the regex source generator #103840
  • nativeaot/SmokeTests/Exceptions failing with `Assertion failed: (n_heaps <= heap_number) || !gc_t_join.joined()` #103839
  • [API Proposal]: Support boolean type discriminator in `JsonDerivedType` #103834
    Future
  • ILLink should error out when failing to resolve assemblies/types/members #103831
    10.0.0
  • [browser] System.Memory.Tests is taking too long on FF #103829
    9.0.0
  • NuGet restore failing with NullReferenceException #103823
  • Review and consider upstreaming vcpkg patches to nethost cmake files and headers #103816
  • ThreadPool unfriendly to background processes #103812
  • [browser] Omit copying assets to build output using StaticWebAssets SDK file path mapping #103810
    10.0.0
  • StackOverflowException in Configuration.Binder source generator #103802
    9.0.0
  • [System.Threading.RateLimiting] Request Leaky Bucket rate limiter #103800
  • Failure in the Exceptions smoke test with CFG #103798
    9.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Emit value type mismatch trying to create a value type #103796
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Incorrect general long time pattern for some cultures on Android #103592
  • Instrument<T>.RecordMeasurement does not record if given empty TagList on .NET Framework #97948
    9.0.0
  • DefaultMeterFactory does not pass MeterOptions future properties to Meter constructor #97941
    9.0.0
  • Finding Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting service provider with using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #88485
  • Optimization removes necessary code #103477
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] perf/aot regression in Normalize ASCII #98522
    9.0.0
  • Enable featuredefault Substitutions To Only Apply at App Publish Time #96539
    9.0.0
  • Default IsDynamicCodeSupported feature switch to true for CoreCLR #80398
    9.0.0
  • Getting errors while running dotnet/performance (https://github.com/dotnet/performance) benchmark with mono #80922
  • crossgen2 error due to .NET 8 dependency in source build #93666
  • .NET 9.0 Preview 2 Android part of MAUI do not compile #101130
  • Possibly broken NuGet package for System.Data.Odbc 7.0 #88281
  • Incorrect if evaluation results in `if (true != true)` being true #103786
  • [mono] Windows CI failures in BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11 #103811
  • Performance: Potentially uneeded nullcheck for using? #103808
  • string.IndexOf() on Thai Culture , Windows11, 64 bits, .net5,6,7,8, return incorrect index #100381
  • Double.TryParse fails on string that has thousands separator. Regression? #100397
  • String.IndexOf has incorrectly behavier in Thai(Thaiand) region #100803
  • lots of unresolved symbols in static lib? #103747

PullRequests

Created

  • Define JIT format jobs as GitHub Actions instead of AzDO jobs #103846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark generic arguments for unresolved generic types #103844
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Use correct cast_class for IntPtr[] #103841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • UnixCommandLinePing.cs: improve searching for the system ping binary #103838
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Clean up JSON property lookup logic and add alternate key lookup support. #103836
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Avoid rare deadlocks when using TypeDescriptor #103835
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Add riscv64 arch to tracing/eventpipe/processinfo tests #103832
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Add RiscV64 arch to tests/JIT/Stress/ABI/ #103830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve use of PAL's RawData for X509Certificate #103828
    area-System.Security
  • ARM64-SVE: GatherPrefetch #103826
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Configuration.Binder source generator #103822
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Make DAC return Module instead of PEAssembly for DacpModuleData::PEAssembly #103821
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Vectorize a few more conversions in TensorPrimitives.ConvertXx #103820
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Set AnyCPU for ProjectReference to source generators #103819
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Enbale TYP_MASK support for ARM64 #103818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] [workloads] Don't load mono librarymode targets if PublishAot is set #103817
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Reduce some allocations in SslStream handshake. #103814
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Clean up liveness #103809
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #103807
    area-Infrastructure
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #103805
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix incorrect time patterns for some cultures on browser in `HybridGlobalization` #103804
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • ARM64-SVE: Add SVE registers to pal context #103801
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [x64][SysV] Classify empty structs for passing like padding #103799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ReciprocalEstimate`, `ReciprocalExponent`, `ReciprocalSqrtEstimate`, `ReciprocalSqrtStep`, and `ReciprocalStep` #103673
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix the ICU time format conversion logic #103681
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-preview6] Flow preview6 emsdk #103827
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Misc Metrics Fixes #103791
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • JIT: rely on DFS for cycle entry detection in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #103788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix return type marshalling on IsKeyStorePrivateKeyEntry #103825
    area-System.Security, os-android
  • JIT: Clean up `FlowGraphDominatorTree::Build` #103803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid substring allocation in Environment.ReadXdgDirectory #103765
    needs-area-label
  • Improve Span.Count #103728
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • Default DynamicCodeSupport to true for CoreCLR #103594
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Enable compaction of all `BBJ_ALWAYS` blocks #103785
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for Sve.ReverseBits() #103806
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add Not, InsertIntoShiftedVector #103725
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Avoid char[] allocation in AltSvcHeaderParser #103764
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Avoid a couple string allocs in EventSource's ManifestBuilder ctor #103744
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Use span-based dictionary lookup in System.Console #103742
    area-System.Console
  • Improve WebUtility.HtmlEncode / UrlEncode performance #103737
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [workloads] Don't load mono librarymode targets if PublishAot is set #103777
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete forgotten ActiveIssue from Http3 Tests #103794
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [LoongArch64] Fix build error for LA64. #103792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Disable BackwardsCompat_Downgrade test on WinHttpHandler #103797
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use new ABI classifiers for `GenTreeCall` arguments #103537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable Http3 tests for Arm #103793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x

Updated

  • JIT: Added SVE APIs - `Test*`, `ExtractVector` #103739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2479501 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics and add run-time check #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Update HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to use a binary search #103778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetNestedExceptionData #103668
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable downwards optimization for multi-exit loops #103181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [HybridGlobalization]Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103647
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Arm64/SVE: Implemented `Scale` and `Sqrt` #103663
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Use SRM's TypeName parser in ILLink #103740
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #103710
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm] Intrinsics for blazor" #103774
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Use bitshift instead of multiply in Unsafe.Add intrinsic if possible #103775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [wasm][firefox] Test crit: OpenQA.Selenium.WebDriverException: Failed to decode response from marionette #103706
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • update proxy setting on registry changes #103364
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.Splice() #103567
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • use also SslCertificateTrust when constructing CertificateContext #103372
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Allow GC on the first instruction of NoGC region (except in prologs/epilogs) #103540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Infinite loop on OdbcDataReader.internalGetString with UTF-8 text #102885
    area-System.Data.Odbc, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Use a hash table for HW intrinsic name -> ID lookups #103763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Support overriding MsQuic.dll in the application directory on Windows. #103351
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Accelerate Vector128<long>::op_Multiply on x64 #103555
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Process.Linux: handle when /proc and the process pid namespace don't match. #100076
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [browser] Bundle assets inside of wasm file #103160
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Update to preview 7 #103789
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser][publish] Windows has problems with AOT build/publish for long paths #103766
    arch-wasm, os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Adding CET support #102680
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Base64Url support for netstandard 2.0 #103617
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable building .dll if both 'CustomNativeMain' and 'NativeLib' are set #103504
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix field accessor for RVA field #103705
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
